original_text: This is what the Lord says: ‘Look! An army is coming from the north. A great nation is preparing to attack you from a place that is far away. This is what the Lord says: ‘Look! An army is coming from the north. A great nation is preparing to attack you from a place that is far away. This is what the Lord says:
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 보라 한 민족이 북방에서 오며 큰 나라가 땅 끝에서부터 떨쳐 일어나나니

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
An army is coming from the north.
A great nation is preparing to attack you
sentences.korean_translation: 위대한 나라가 당신을 공격할 준비를 하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: from a place that is far away.
